ul_348230: rm -rf /home/*/mail/new/

for d in /home/*/mail/new/; do
    rm -rf "$d" && mkdir "$d"
done

for f in /home/*/mail/new/* /home/*/mail/new/.*; do
    rm -rf "$f"
done

shopt -s dotglob
for f in /home/*/mail/new/*; do
        rm -rf "$f"
done

nl2bash_11640: find . -not \( -name .svn -prune -o -name .git -prune \) -type f -exec sed -i "s/[[:space:]]*$//g" "{}" \;


find . -not \( -name .svn -prune -o -name .git -prune \) -type f -print0 | xargs -0 sed -i '' -E "s/[[:space:]]*$//"
